item.title: 06.09.2024 Polish Defence and Security Equipment Catalogue The Polish defence industry plays a significant role in the country’s economy and global standing. The Polish Defence And Security Equipment Catalogue showcases a range of advanced technologies and innovative solutions developed by Polish companies. These innovations span various sectors, including electronics, cyberspace, armoured vehicles and artillery systems, weapons systems, aerospace & space as well as air and missile defence, which highlights Poland’s leadership in defence and security. The Catalogue contains 207 products by 61 companies. Więcej
